documents.document: You cannot push anyone up the ladder unless he is willing to climb. - Andrew Carnegie
How you make others feel about themselves, says a lot about you.

We don't stop dreaming and exploring because we grow old. We grow old because we stop dreaming and exploring.

I'm strong because I know my weaknesses. I'm wise because I've been foolish. I laugh because I've known sadness.

I used to believe that prayer changes things, but now I know that prayer changes us and we change things.
Turn your cant's into cans and your dreams into plans.
Fear kills more dreams than failure ever will.
Raise your words, not your voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
Sometimes you find yourself in the middle of nowhere, and sometimes in the middle of nowhere, you find yourself.
